pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Pyskema## AboutPyskema is a small module used to define schema for structured data.The schema can be used to validate, document and generate data.## InstallationUse `pip install pyskema`.Pyskema does not have dependencies and is only standard Python 3.7+.## UsagePlease refer to the [documentation](https://pyskema.readthedocs.io).
